articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: A star has been destroyed by a wandering supermassive black hole - Ars Technica
articles.description: Second supermassive black hole is a long way from the galaxy’s core.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Features New Corning® Gorilla® Glass Ceramic 2 for Enhanced Durability - Samsung Newsroom
articles.description: With Corning’s leading-edge manufacturing technology, Corning® Gorilla® Glass Ceramic 2 offers engineered resilience on Galaxy S25 Edge, the slimmest Galaxy S series yet
articles.content: Samsung Electronics and Corning Incorporated (NYSE: GLW) today announced that the upcoming Galaxy S25 Edge will feature Corning® Gorilla® Glass Ceramic 2,1 a new glass ceramic offering that delivers … [+3350 chars]
